nodes.text: The apprentice of Vaius Antinus was buried in a tomb on the planet Aduba-6. Auselio Gann of the Sith Imperial Reclamation Service visited this apprentice's tomb at some point prior to 3640 BBY. Both Sith and Jedi were interested in uncovering the tomb's secrets, and Gann found himself pursued by both. In an effort to turn the tomb's traps against them, he imprisoned himself inside the tomb, and died there. His body was later found by his protege Talos Drellik.
The Tomb of Vaius Antinus's unnamed apprentice is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during Talos Drellik companion storyline.
